meanings.definition: A person who makes or sells cups.
meanings.sent1: The cupper at the store showed me different types of cups.
meanings.sent2: The cupper carefully arranged the cups on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cupper joked that he could drink a cup of coffee faster than anyone.
meanings.sent4: She was a cupper, always on the lookout for unique cup designs.
meanings.sent5: The cupper's hands were always stained with clay from crafting cups.

meanings.definition: A device used for measuring the capacity of a cup.
meanings.sent1: The cupper helped ensure each cup had the right volume.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen had a cupper to check if the cups were full.
meanings.sent3: The cupper beeped loudly when the cup was overflowing.
meanings.sent4: The cupper was like a tiny detective investigating cup sizes.
meanings.sent5: The cupper's display showed the exact measurement of each cup.

meanings.sent1: The cupper race was the highlight of the annual fair.
meanings.sent2: Spectators cheered as the horses lined up for the cupper.
meanings.sent3: The cupper event had horses wearing tiny cups on their heads.
meanings.sent4: In the cupper, the fastest horse always wins the cup.
meanings.sent5: The cupper track was filled with excitement as the horses raced.
